name: Asteroid Fight
description: ASTEROID FIGHT is an online multiplayer action real-time strategy game. Use your commander with uniquely modified special abilities, build a strong economy to be able to quickly grow a strong military so you can stand a chance against your enemies and destroy their warp gate.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD/ATI, NVidia with at least 256MB, Intel HD Graphics or better Storage: 500 MB available space
